headline: Autodesk (ADSK): Exploring Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness and Ongoing Double-Digit Growth
summary: Autodesk (ADSK) has been drifting sideways lately, with the stock roughly flat over the past month but down around 9% in the past 3 months, despite double digit annual revenue and earnings growth. See our latest analysis for Autodesk. At around $292.97, Autodesk’s recent share price weakness contrasts with a modestly positive 1 year total shareholder return. Its strong 3 year total shareholder return suggests the longer term momentum story is still intact even if near term enthusiasm is...
